name: Invasion Day BBQ WIP
description:
It's Invasion Day! The fam is celebrating by BBQing some meat and resentfully being in proximity to each other!

Just a snippet of a work in progress experience and first foray into 3D game design and level development. I want this to be a short narrative of the types of energy and people you would encounter at a family get together on Invasion Day that many of us would be familiar with. And to try my hand at basic modelling and level design.

No menu, options, or any of those fancy things. You'll have to alt-f4 to get out after you start :)
